-- PostgreSQL Schema Creation Script
-- Generated by Encina Module Isolation
-- This script is idempotent and can be run multiple times safely

-- Create schema: lookup
CREATE SCHEMA IF NOT EXISTS "lookup";
DO $$ BEGIN RAISE NOTICE 'Ensured schema exists: lookup'; END $$;

-- Create schema: shared
CREATE SCHEMA IF NOT EXISTS "shared";
DO $$ BEGIN RAISE NOTICE 'Ensured schema exists: shared'; END $$;

-- Create schema: orders
CREATE SCHEMA IF NOT EXISTS "orders";
DO $$ BEGIN RAISE NOTICE 'Ensured schema exists: orders'; END $$;

-- Create schema: payments
CREATE SCHEMA IF NOT EXISTS "payments";
DO $$ BEGIN RAISE NOTICE 'Ensured schema exists: payments'; END $$;

DO $$ BEGIN RAISE NOTICE 'Schema creation completed successfully.'; END $$;
